name: Night Owls
description:
Puzzle game about aliens and hearts made in few days for Rainbow Game Jam 2020. Dialogues were written late night. Hope they are not too broken

Controls:

Q - changing type of hearts

R - Restart

ESC - Quitting

I have used:

Engine - Unity3D

Graphics - Aseprite

SFX - BFXR

Music - Garage Band

Font - justabit from public domain font pack
